record.field: The Variant "%(product)s" has a Raw or Main Variant but its template doesn\'t have the mark "Has Raw Variants".
The Variant "%(product)s" has a Raw Variant but it is configured as "Is Raw Variant", which doesn\'t make sense.
The Variant "%(product)s" has a Main Variant but it isn\'t configured as "Is Raw Variant", which doesn\'t make sense.
Delete raw variants is forbidden.\n You are trying to delete the variant "%(raw_product)s" but it is defined as Raw Variant for product"%(product)s".
